data.name: Delgado journey
data.desc: Dominican friar is sent from [Santiago de?] Guat with despatches for Gov of Yuc, and is tasked with finding a route via Manche Chol settlements [eg Campin, Soite], Mopan [Macal?] River, Tipuj, Bacalar [original site? Pacha?], and on to Merida
data.locn: Cajabon [Guat], Moho R, Mopan R, [missg], Merida
data.agents_sp: Fr Joseph Delgado 3 vecinos fm Bacalar or Tihosuco
data.prim_n: Thompson 22 / Bib France MS [missg] [Memorias de los parajes y ríos que ay desde el pueblo de San Miguel Manché hasta los indios ahizaes-el camino y indios]  / Bib France MS [missg] [Viage a Bacalar, y encuentro de los de Bacalar, los nombres estan en el derrotero que di a V.P.M.R., el de la canoa se llama Alonso Moreno] / ESCRIBANIA,339A / GUATEMALA,152
data.note: Was not permitted to enter Tipuj /v Jones 249 /Thompson M [missg] [transcription of Delgado accounts]
